    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class system.Main
    Creates the controller, which is made of a model and a view.
    Main - Class in system
    Calls main() function, which calls creates the GameController.
    Main() - Constructor for class system.Main
    So Javadoc doesn't throw a fit
    MAX_HAND_SIZE - Static variable in class system.Const
    The maximum number of cards in hand.

    The maximum possible score.

    mDisconnect - Variable in class system.GameView
    Disconnects from a running multiplayer game
    mHostGame - Variable in class system.GameView
    Starts a new game against humans and AI
    mJoinGame - Variable in class system.GameView
    Joins a multiplayer game that is currently running
